name: Fowl Magic (itch)
description:
An elemental combination game, mixing elements from Doodle God and Tetris.

Fowl Magic is a fusion between genres.  Fuse orbs together in order to achieve a high score but beware of incompatible combos leaving grey matter clogging up the field. Smash together elements as you train your speed and memory in the pursuit to become an arcane master. 

Developed for android and PC.
